header: You cannot hold this card, but must place it face up in front of you as soon as you get it. If you drew it, immediately draw another card to replace it.
title: Death
description:
You cannot win if you have this unless the Goal says otherwise.
If you have this at the start of your turn, discard something else you have in play (a Keeper or a Creeper). You may discard this anytime it stands alone.
